title: Working on a Tripkodoo business plan tonight
content:
Your company name:
Tripkodoo
Your company product:
opml-based collaborative document editing via microformats
Oh, hell. It looks like Web Two Point Oh! has nailed me on one of my stewing projects, Micronian. Sorta. Minus the OPML, really.

Though, hey, Tripkodoo sounds like a cool name...
